name: Pixel conveyor
description:
Pixel conveyor is a free sandbox game where you have simple things to do stuff.the stuff can be simple like a square conveyor transporting a box zo a calculator that calculates with binary numbers.

If you want to play the game for free but don't know how because you could be new to itch.io or something , when pressing download now , there is a text "No thanks, just take me to the downloads" press it and you can download it.

there is a tutorial file in the free downloadable zip file,which also contains the game itself.

if you have ideas for elements that you want to see in the game write a comment with the idea and it could b added in the next update

if you have a better name for the game please write a commen (i'm not creative when thinking of names).

the controls are difficult so read the tutorial file it will get some more information in the next update.
